summary:
OmnichainMade Easy - Connect data, assets, and more with Entangle's fast and fully customizable interoperability primitives.

 Photon Messaging - An Omnichain Messaging Protocol enabling protocols to send and receive data & assets across both EVM and non-EVM Chains.

 Universal Data feeds - Fully customizable, high-frequency data feeds with an update time of less than seven seconds, optimal for a variety of protocols, including DeFi, GameFi & RWA protocols.
